model

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the board model. It has an ArrayList of Figures which are on Board, 2-D boolean array (informs what places are taken) and freshFigure (the figure which is now steered by player).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board()
      Constructor is creating new ArrayList of figures which are on Board, new 2-D boolean Array, which tells if panel is already taken by any Figure and this constructor is also reseting the board.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addFigure(Figure figure)
      Adding the Figure to the ArrayList of figures which are on Board and changing the freshFigure to this given figure.
      void freshFigureDown()
      Method which is responsible for falling the figure which is now being steered by player.
      void freshFigureLeft()
      Move the figure to left.
      void freshFigureRight()
      Move the figure to right.
      boolean freshFigureRotate()
      If figure cannot be rotated false is returned, if it can be rotated it would be rotated.
      Figure getFigureFromIndex(int ind) 
      java.util.ArrayList<Figure> getFiguresOnBoard() 
      boolean[][] getPlaceTakenMatrix() 
      int numbersOfFigures() 
      int removeFullLines()
      Removing the lines which are full and putting down blocks if needed after removing lines.
      void resetBoard()
      Reseting board to original state.
      boolean tryMove(Figure figure, int diffX, int diffY)
      Checking if move with given X and Y difference is allowed.
      boolean tryMoveDownFreshFigure()
      Checking if the down move is possible.

      • addFigure

        public void addFigure(Figure figure)
        Adding the Figure to the ArrayList of figures which are on Board and changing the freshFigure to this given figure.
        Parameters:
        figure - the figure which we want to add to ArrayList of figures which are on Board

        public boolean[][] getPlaceTakenMatrix()

        public int numbersOfFigures()
        Returns:
        number of figures which are now on board

        Returns:

      • getFigureFromIndex

        public Figure getFigureFromIndex(int ind)
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        figure at given index in ArrayList

      • freshFigureDown

        public void freshFigureDown()
        Method which is responsible for falling the figure which is now being steered by player.

        Move the figure to left.

      • freshFigureRight

        public void freshFigureRight()
        Move the figure to right.

      • tryMove

        public boolean tryMove(Figure figure,
                       int diffX,
                       int diffY)
        Checking if move with given X and Y difference is allowed.
        Parameters:
        figure - this figure we want to move
        diffX - difference in X position of figure after wanted move
        diffY - difference in Y position of figure after wanted move
        Returns:
        false if that move is not allowed, true if it is allowed

      • tryMoveDownFreshFigure

        public boolean tryMoveDownFreshFigure()
        Checking if the down move is possible. If not, positions of blocks in isPanelTaken array are changed to already taken and false is returned.
        Returns:
        false if figure cannot move down (it reached bottom of Board or reached the figure that has already fallen), true if move down is possible

      • freshFigureRotate

        public boolean freshFigureRotate()
        If figure cannot be rotated false is returned, if it can be rotated it would be rotated.
        Returns:
        true is freshFigure can rotate, false if not

      • removeFullLines

        public int removeFullLines()
        Removing the lines which are full and putting down blocks if needed after removing lines.
        Returns:
        number of lines which were cleaned (max 4)

      • resetBoard

        public final void resetBoard()
        Reseting board to original state.
